trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to unload an application domain fails.
trans-unit.target: 尝试卸载应用程序域失败时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: CannotUnloadAppDomainException is thrown when there is an attempt to unload the following: - The default application domain, which must remain loaded during the lifetime of the application.
trans-unit.target: 尝试卸载下面时引发 CannotUnloadAppDomainException:-应用程序的生命周期内必须保持加载的默认应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: - An application domain with a running thread that cannot immediately stop execution.
trans-unit.target: 的具有正在运行的线程无法立即停止执行应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: - An application domain that has already been unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 的已卸载应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: CannotUnloadAppDomainException uses the HRESULT COR_E_CANNOTUNLOADAPPDOMAIN, which has the value 0x80131015.
trans-unit.target: CannotUnloadAppDomainException 使用 HRESULT COR_E_CANNOTUNLOADAPPDOMAIN，其值 0x80131015。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of CannotUnloadAppDomainException, see the <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: CannotUnloadAppDomainException 的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempt to unload the AppDomain failed."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息描述诸如"的尝试卸载 AppDomain 时失败。"的错误，将新实例的属性</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>.</xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 内容`message`参数旨在为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>.</xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述该错误。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref>从序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，则为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>.</xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是 null 引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
